28.ara-name: كتاب الطب عن رسول اللَّهِ صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Imran bin Husain narrated that the Messenger of Allah (s.a.w) prohibited cauterization. He said:"We were tested (with severe medical condition) so we were cauterized, but we did not have good results, nor was it successful for us." Another chain reports a similar narration

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كَرَاهِيَةِ التَّدَاوِي بِالْكَىِّ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About It Being disliked to use Cauterization
